ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: desiring only the Face of their Lord Most High.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Other than seeking the glory of his Lord, most high,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: but only to seek the good pleasure of his Lord Most High.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except the pleasure of their Lord, the Most High
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He desires only to please his Lord, the Supreme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except to seek the Face of his Lord, the Most High.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except the seeking of the pleasure of his Lord, the Most High.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: only seeking the Face of his Lord the Most High;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Except as seeking (to fulfil) the purpose of his Lord Most High.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: acting only for the sake of his Lord the Most High --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But only seeking the Countenance of his Lord the Most High.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: but seek only the pleasure of their Lord, the Most Exalted,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But only the desire to seek for the Countenance of their Lord Most High;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except only the desire to seek the Countenance of his Lord, the Most High;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: seeking only the Face of his Lord, the Most High,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Only seeking the acceptance of his Lord, the Most High.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:20] but, he did this, only seeking the pleasure of his Lord the Most High, that is to say, only seeking [to secure] God’s reward;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Except as seeking (to fulfil) the purpose of his Lord Most High) except seeking the good pleasure of his Lord the Most High, Who is higher than everything.
